successfulResults.originalText: Forgotten Star Dorothy Stratten Almost Lived the Hollywood Fairy Tale. It Ended as a Horror Story....
successfulResults.simplifiedText:
Dorothy Stratten's story was almost perfect.

* She became a famous model.
* She married a famous actor.
* She was going to be a star.

But it ended badly.

* She was murdered by her husband.
* It was...

successfulResults.originalText: Peter Bogdanovich, Bob Fosse, and Hugh Hefner all loved her, in their own ways—for better and worse. This reexamination of Stratten’s life, rape, and murder casts a new light on the angel who was a ce...
successfulResults.simplifiedText:
Peter Bogdanovich, Bob Fosse, and Hugh Hefner liked her.

* Peter Bogdanovich liked her.
* Bob Fosse liked her.
* Hugh Hefner liked her.

They liked her in different ways.

* Some liked her for good r...

successfulResults.simplifiedText:

* She entered a contest called the Great Playmate Hunt.
* The contest was looking for a perfect picture....

successfulResults.originalText: Before it was a horror story, it was a fairy tale....
successfulResults.simplifiedText:
It was once a happy story.

But now it is scary.

It used to be:

* A happy story
* A fairy tale

Now it is a horror story....

successfulResults.originalText: Once upon a time (in 1978) in a Podunk town (Coquitlam, on the outskirts of Vancouver) lived a young girl named Dorothy Hoogstraten. Dorothy, 17, a high school senior, was working her usual shift at a...
successfulResults.simplifiedText:
In 1978, a girl named Dorothy lived in Coquitlam, near Vancouver.

* She was 17 years old.
* She worked at a Dairy Queen.

One day, a man named Paul Snider came in. He was 26 years old.

* He wore a l...

successfulResults.originalText: Snider didn’t tell Dorothy he was a pimp; told Dorothy he was a promoter, which he also was. In LA, he’d put on the California Truckin’ & Cycle Show at the Convention Center. Photographer Howard Koby ...
successfulResults.simplifiedText:
When you read this story:

* Meet Snider, a man with two jobs.
* He was a promoter and a pimp, but he didn't tell Dorothy about that.

Snider did some fun things in LA:

* He put on a big show at the ...

successfulResults.simplifiedText:

* He bought her flowers.
* He sang to her.
* He took her to prom.

But Snider wanted more. He wanted to see Dorothy's body.

But the camera loved her.

* Innocent
* Pure
* But also a little naughty

Snider then signed the paper for his mom.
